plentry.pd: The sampling rate (Hz) of sending the local user's audio stream.
The average bitrate (Kbps) of sending the local user's audio stream.
The packet loss rate (%) from the local client to the Agora server before applying the anti-packet loss strategies.
播放或录制音频时，音频设备模块的延迟 (ms)。
耳返延迟 (ms)，即声音从麦克风输入到耳机输出的延迟。
回声消除延迟 (ms)，即回声消除 (Acoustic Echo Cancellation, AEC) 模块测算出音频在本地播放前与被本地采集后的信号延迟。
